title.@value: Inappropriate parental pressure or other abnormal qualities of upbringing

definition.@value: Parents forcing the child to be different from the local norm, either sex-inappropriate (e.g. dressing a boy in girl's clothes), age-inappropriate (e.g. forcing a child to take on responsibilities above her or his own age) or otherwise inappropriate (e.g. pressing the child to engage in unwanted or too difficult activities).

label.@value: Inappropriate parental pressure or other abnormal qualities of upbringing
